jgame.controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIntensityController, AbstractLocRotController, AlphaTween, ConstantMovementController, ConstantRotationController, EntranceExitController, GParallax.GTiledSprite.ScrollController, KeyboardLocationController, MouseLocationController, MouseRotationController, MovementTween, OscillationController, PointOrbitController, PolygonController, PulsateController, RotationTween, ScaleTween, SizeTween, TweenController

    public interface Controller
    An object that can control a game object based on user interaction.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void controlObject(GObject target, Context context)
      Performs one iteration of controlling the specified object in the given context.

    • Method Detail

      • controlObject

        void controlObject(GObject target,
                   Context context)
        Performs one iteration of controlling the specified object in the given context.
        Parameters:
        target - the object to control
        context - the relevant context
